roleset.name: extremely important
roleset.note: SUPERIMPORTANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. Relation to important.01. (from superimportant.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: And I think that everything they were ever channeling was superimportant, because it was the main catalyst doing what they do.
example.arg: because it was the main catalyst doing what they do

example.name: both args
example.text: I have no love for Bachmann and even less for Cameron , but I 'm not sure why she -LRB- or anyone else -RRB- should be expected to treat the batshitcrazy rantings of a has - been child actor like they 're super-important to the political scene .
